trans-unit.source: Represents the configuration element that specifies the security settings for a SSL stream binding.
trans-unit.target: 表示指定 SSL 流绑定的安全设置的配置元素。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.SslStreamSecurityElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.SslStreamSecurityElement"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Applies the content of a specified binding element to this binding configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的绑定元素的内容应用到此绑定配置元素。

trans-unit.source: A binding element.
trans-unit.target: 一个绑定元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of this binding element.
trans-unit.target: 获取此绑定元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: The type of this binding element.
trans-unit.target: 此绑定元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: Copies the content of the specified configuration element to this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的配置元素的内容复制到此配置元素。

trans-unit.source: The configuration element to be copied.
trans-unit.target: 要复制的配置元素。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether a client certificate is required for this binding.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，指定是否为此绑定需要客户端证书。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a client certificate is required for this binding; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果客户端证书，才能使用此绑定;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the list of SSL/TLS protocols to negotiate when using a client credential type of TcpClientCredentialType.Certificate.
trans-unit.target: 指定使用 TcpClientCredentialType.Certificate 的客户端凭据类型时要协商的 SSL/TLS 协议的列表。

trans-unit.source: The value can be a combination of one of more of the following enumeration members: Ssl3, Tls, Tls11, Tls12.
trans-unit.target: 该值可以为一个或多个下列枚举成员的组合︰ Ssl3、 Tls、 Tls11、 Tls12。

trans-unit.source: The default value is Ssl3 | Tls | Tls11 | Tls12.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是 Ssl3 |Tls |Tls11 |Tls12。

trans-unit.source: Versions of the framework prior to 4.6 only support Ssl3 and Tls.
trans-unit.target: 4.6 之前的 framework 版本仅支持 Ssl3 和 Tls。

trans-unit.source: If these are not included, communication with earlier versions of the framework will not be possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果它们不包括在内，将不可能与早期版本的 framework 的通信。

trans-unit.source: Specifying Tls11 and/or Tls12 will disable the usage of Ssl3, even if it has been included.
trans-unit.target: 指定 Tls11 和/或 Tls12 将禁用 Ssl3 的使用情况，即使它已包含。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols>.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols>
